docstring.long_description: Create a CAN message that can be used to send to real systems.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to be sent. Will be converted in an array of bytes.

parameters.name: error_frame
parameters.description: Whether the frame is an error frame, by default False.

parameters.name: can_fd
parameters.description: Whether the frame is a CAN FD frame (Flexible Data-Rate), by default False.

returns.description: A list of can message with the message created.
